question: What does thefile.writelines(lines)method do?

options.A: Writes a single line to the file
options.B: Writes multiple lines to the file from a list
options.C: Writes the entire content of another file
options.D: Writes a specific number of characters to the file

answer_description: file.writelines(lines)writes multiple lines to the file from a list.
